import React from 'react' import {Card,CardBody} from "reactstrap"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {title,city,photo,price, featured , avgRating , reviews}= tour return (
{featured}
{city} {avgRating} {""} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price} /per/person
) } export default TourCard
